title: The Brave Little Toaster complete trilogy + OST
description:
The Brave Little Toaster

All three movies, cover art, and the original film's complete soundtrack with bonus tracks.

Videos:
- The Brave Little Toaster (1987).avi
- The Brave Little Toaster To The Rescue (1997).avi
- The Brave Little Toaster Goes To Mars (1998).avi

Original Motion Picture Soundtrack by David Newman, Van Dyke Parks and the New Japan Philharmonic Orchestra, plus bonus tracks:
- 01 - Main Title.mp3
- 02 - They All Wake Up.mp3
- 03 - Blanket's Dream.mp3
- 04 - The Air Conditioner Blows.mp3
- 05 - They Decide to Go.mp3
- 06 - They Look for Transportation.mp3
- 07 - Out into the World.mp3
- 08 - City of Lights.mp3
- 09 - Blanket Looks for a Place to Sleep.mp3
- 10 - The Pond-Busby Berkley-The Meadow.mp3
- 11 - Toaster's Dream.mp3
- 12 - The Storm.mp3
- 13 - Blanket Is Blown Away.mp3
- 14 - The Waterfall.mp3
- 15 - Vacuum Rescues the Group.mp3
- 16 - They Sink in the Mud.mp3
- 17 - In the Shop.mp3
- 18 - Blender's Motor Is Sold.mp3
- 19 - It's a 'B' Movie.mp3
- 20 - Radio Is Stalked.mp3
- 21 - Happy Travel.mp3
- 22 - Into the City.mp3
- 23 - Cutting Edge.mp3
- 24 - Junkyard Montage.mp3
- 25 - Worthless.mp3
- 26 - Finale.mp3
- 27 - End Title.mp3
- Bonus - Little Richard - Tutti Frutti.mp3
- Bonus - Al Jolson - My Mammy.mp3
